flawed_nl_solution:
Mara has 150 - 40 = <<150-40=100>>100 cards.
Janet has 100/2 = <<100/2=50>>50 cards since Mara has twice as many as Janet.
Brenda has 50 - 9 = <<50-9=41>>41 cards since Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda.
Therefore, they all have 100 + 50 + 41 = <<100+50+41=191>>191 cards.
#### 191

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 100. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
